letter.body: Thank you for taking thc time to contact us and for your interest in our Doral products and promotions
letter.closing: AgainMr. Deberry, we appreciate your taking the time to contact us.Best wishes from all ofus at Reynolds.
letter.title: Pat Riggs, Consuner Relations Representative
